item.title: Building a CO2 Energy Sensor
item.author: m.harper@outlook.com (Michael Harper)
item.description: What else better to do over the Christmas holidays than to come up new smart home devices! And this is exactly what I have done, building a light which provides me an update on the current carbon intensity of the electricity supply. I am quite happy with the end result, and this blog explains the motivation behind the idea, along with code for anyone who wants to replicate it.
